root.name: BC Racers
root.description: PLOTMillstone Rockafella, the millionarie playboy has organized a series of bike races, the winner of which will recieve the Ultimate Boulderdash Bike.GAMEPLAYThe game has four difficulty settings, each of which have eight circuits. Unfortunately, this game didn't take a page from Mario Kart. There are no powerups except for the occasional boost. The game has been criticisized due to the fact that the driving is a little bit too responsive. Very much more so than other racing games of the era.
